application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
TPO.2019.1120 - T1 Lime front Somerset road. To contain crown spread and improve light, reduce back to previous reduction points approx. 25-30%.
T2 Lime x2 rear left On boundary with no 4 Somerset Road. Reduce back to previous reduction points approx. 25-30% x2 trees 
T3 Robinia rear left On boundary with no 4 Somerset Road. Reduce back to previous reduction points approx. 25- 30%.
T4 Bay rear left Reduce back over garage roof by 1-2m. 
T5 Eucalyptus rear Lavington road side. To contain crown spread, suggest: reduce and reshape by approx. 2-3m or 30%.
T6 Robinia rear Lavington road side. Reduce back from gutter and roof on no 2 Lavington Road. 
T7 Dead tree rear Ivy covered, on boundary with Loveday Road. Fell to ground level. 
T8 Cypress front Raise crown to previous level for pedestrian clearance.
